BackstoryDef.title: fool
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a secluded grotto by a tribe of mysterious fauns. [PAWN_nameDef] was treat like a toy by these faun, who would insist that [PAWN_pronoun] dance, sing and make a fool of [PAWN_objective]self for their amusement.

BackstoryDef.title: trumpeter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tooted [PAWN_possessive] own horn, literally, at [PAWN_possessive] community’s ritual parades. \n\nThe meaning of these celebrations became all-too clear when the shaman of the community burned none-believers in a roaring, ritualistic fire before the parade attendees. [PAWN_nameDef] could never approach fire or toot the trumpet ever again, in fear of awakening that bygone trauma once more.

BackstoryDef.title: rapscallion
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] pilfered glasses from inns, reselling them at the market the very next day. Each and every coin that [PAWN_nameDef] earned went towards affording [PAWN_possessive] sickly father a cure for his illness. Growing up a breadwinner gave [PAWN_nameDef] a streak of independence that never seemed to fade, even into adulthood.

BackstoryDef.title: roustabout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], unlike many satyrs, was always willing to lend a hand to [PAWN_possessive] neighbours, and took up odd-jobs in farming and carpentry to make [PAWN_possessive] parents ends meet.

BackstoryDef.title: incognito
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born from a forbidden relationship between a human and a satyr. [PAWN_possessive] adoptive mother brought [PAWN_nameDef] into an urban society of humans, and attempted to conceal her child’s identity as a satyr. [PAWN_nameDef] would hide [PAWN_possessive] horns underneath a hat, and cover [PAWN_possessive] hooves with adult-size shoes. \n\nAs [PAWN_pronoun] grew older, this disguise became harder to maintain, and the family were eventually shunned from the community for their façade.

BackstoryDef.title: uncouth
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a troublesome child; always getting into spats and starting fights with the other children, [PAWN_pronoun] never seemed to grasp the concept of kindness whatsoever.

BackstoryDef.title: rejected suitor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When the heir to a nearby settlement was promised a gorgeous suitor as a peace offering, they were a little underwhelmed when [PAWN_nameDef] arrived at their door. But to [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_pronoun] had practically won life’s lottery; getting to spend [PAWN_possessive] days schmoozing around the royal chambers, dining on plate after plate of exotic fruits and meats, and having [PAWN_possessive] image immortalised by royal painters; life was perfect. \n\nAlas, the arranged marriage never happened, and [PAWN_nameDef] was returned to [PAWN_possessive] settlement with a “thank you, but no”.

BackstoryDef.title: sleaze
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]’s notoriety as the village lech preceded [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] galloped after fauns, humans and elves with open arms, begging for date or, at least, a peck on the cheek. The closest [PAWN_nameDef] ever got was a left-hook in the jaw.

BackstoryDef.title: leader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fostered a community of lost-in-their-way satyrs and fauns deep within a sprawling woodland. [PAWN_nameDef] helped raise each and every one of the community’s newborns with a heart full of love, and as they came of age, [PAWN_pronoun] taught them how to fight and how to forage, as well as a few dirty jokes and rude words.

BackstoryDef.title: life model
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: While reclining in [PAWN_possessive] usual resting spot, [PAWN_nameDef] turned [PAWN_possessive] head to spot a troupe of artistic fauns painting [PAWN_possessive] portrait. While initially shy, the fauns returned weekly to paint [PAWN_nameDef]’s image, and eventually, [PAWN_nameDef] amassed quite a following.

BackstoryDef.title: berserker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an up-close-and-personal brawler for a dreaded cult of forest folk. Though paladins and adventurers attempted to put an end to [PAWN_possessive] clan time-and-time-again, [PAWN_nameDef] never failed to bite back and give these warriors a warning that they’d never forget, sending them home with ruthless, life-changing injuries.

BackstoryDef.title: stone-faced guard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: While satyrs are known for their playful jokes and devilish streaks, [PAWN_nameDef] is certainly not cut from the same cloth. [PAWN_nameDef] patrolled the outskirts of the forestry grove for intruders and thieves, using [PAWN_possessive] gallant horns to smite down any who dare trespass on satyr soil.

BackstoryDef.title: diplomat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] secured bountiful trade deals overseas for [PAWN_possessive] growing hometown. It wasn't long before the high-stress position of a diplomat got to [PAWN_possessive] brain, and many failed deals later, [PAWN_nameDef] faded back into [PAWN_possessive] community as a has-been and a drunk.

BackstoryDef.title: exiled nomad
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A rancerous night of drinking at [PAWN_nameDef]'s campside lead to a fatal argument between [PAWN_objective] and [PAWN_possessive] closest ally. Ultimately, only [PAWN_nameDef] returned home, and all fingers were pointed at [PAWN_objective], assuming that [PAWN_pronoun] was responsible. [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of the village, never to return.

BackstoryDef.title: philanderer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Loyalty was never in [PAWN_nameDef]'s nature. Flouncing from one bed to another every night really sharpened [PAWN_nameDef] skills in flattery.

BackstoryDef.title: loafer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: No matter the treacherousness of an adventure, no matter the risk, the danger, the distance; you could always count on [PAWN_nameDef]...to not do it. [PAWN_pronoun] was usually far too busy anyway: finding the perfect patch of shade to fall asleep in was tiring work.

BackstoryDef.title: nudist bard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a nudist bard. With a mastery of the panpipes, the lyre and various other instruments, [PAWN_nameDef] entertained both noble and common folk for hours with [PAWN_possessive] musical prowess.

BackstoryDef.title: stud
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] founded a small colony atop the mountainous crown of a frosty tundra. [PAWN_pronoun] built homes for [PAWN_possessive] people and kept them well fed, but more impressively, was personally responsible for reviving the satyr population in [PAWN_possessive] forgotten corner of the world.

BackstoryDef.title: croupier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s family embraced their natural heritage and went off to live in the wild, but [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't cut out of a life filled with creepy-crawlies and doing [PAWN_possessive] business out in the open. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] moved to an industrial, smog-blanketed city and became a dealer at an underground casino. Tourists would flock here just to see this exotic xeno in the flesh.

BackstoryDef.title: loungelizard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lurked inside the town’s brothels; and whether or not [PAWN_pronoun] was looking for trouble, it usually found [PAWN_objective]. Fortunately, [PAWN_nameDef] not only had a way with words, but knives too, and used them as a deterrent against unwelcome company who entered [PAWN_possessive] usual hangout spots. \n\nThe madams of the brothels always ensured that [PAWN_nameDef] had [PAWN_possessive] fill, in exchange for keeping the premises safe.

BackstoryDef.title: flaming bard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined an impid community as an entertainer. Though a typically depressive race, impids would crack- well, not entirely a smile- but a grimace, at [PAWN_nameDef]’s songs and jokes.

BackstoryDef.title: hellgoat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Contrary to the pacifist nature of many satyrs, [PAWN_nameDef] always had a thirst for calamity and bloodshed. [PAWN_pronoun] lived alongside an impid tribe, and was heralded as a masterful tactician there.

BackstoryDef.title: dark shaman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: During an expedition through the scorching desert, [PAWN_nameDef] was apprehended by a band of impids and enslaved by their tribe as a labourer. As time progressed, [PAWN_pronoun] outwitted and outsmarted [PAWN_possessive] masters time and time again with deceitful tricks and riddles, eventually earning a place in the tribe as a shaman.

BackstoryDef.title: flamesmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] married into a community of impids.\n\n As war broke out across the badlands, [PAWN_nameDef] was drafted onto the front lines, and brandished a range of explosive weapons to keep [PAWN_possessive] spouse and family safe from outside invaders.
